READ THIS !!: All data must be passed in JSON, If fetch failed server will respond with a 400x code all responses will be in this form {error: true, message: 'message error'}, otherwise if fetch is good server will respond with a 200x code check a specific route on this document to get more information's on the data returned. PS: Data in the request-body are not good do not send this data to the server they are just here as examples

feed/cards.description: Get all events card for a specific user.

oauth/register.description: Create an user in the bizzy bdd.
